name: .PTW File Extension
summary: Learn about .PTW files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Settings file used by AutoCAD, a CAD application used for 3D design and documentation; stores properties for a drawing that has been published to a Web format; placed alongside the published HTML content so that the Web Publishing Wizard can track what has been published.

content: Publish To Web Template files, which are stored in .PWT files, can be created to repeat the publishing process for one or more drawings.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
